data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Chamrajnagar, Karnataka, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chamrajnagar, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Chamrajnagar, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Chamrajnagar do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Chamrajnagar, Karnataka, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Chamrajnagar, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Chamrajnagar who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Chamrajnagar, Karnataka, India has a population of 1,020,800.

We estimate Chamrajnagar has 11,229 people who might know Jesus, 12,386 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 997,186 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Chamrajnagar, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
